googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Michelle Lee
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I want to give a shout out to Ron for changing out my faucet and putting in new and fixing the leak under my kitchen sink. I definitely will be using him again. Also when I called I got his voice mail he immediately called me back and came out within an hour. Thank you Ron for your great service and quick response!👍😃
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you, Mrs.Lee for nice review.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: David Lankford
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Ron has been in the plumbing trade for over 40yrs.  He was a referral from our HOA President, and consequently used primarily in our subdivision servicing $300k-600k+ homes and investment properties.  Ron’s time in the plumbing industry, relationships, and time in the community make him an invaluable resource.  Over the past several months and especially during COVID shortages he has provided what seems to be an invaluable resource and that is peace of mind.  I can ask him to resolve anything from replacing a garbage disposal to fixing a fireplace (gas pipe) without having to follow-up with him.  He gets the job done, often goes beyond expectation, and is quick to communicate…even when he just got out of the hospital.  I love this guy, and he reminds me why I miss my Southern Americans and their gracious inviting charm! -David Lanfkord Maj, USAF (ret)
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Miranda Cater
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great services,  He show up when I couldn't get anyone else. He's been so helpful to my husband and I

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc. in Alabama, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  - Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc. is a corporation registered in Alabama. The business is listed with the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, indicating compliance with state licensing requirements[1][3].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  - The business is located at 272 County Road 1048, Clanton, AL 35046-4856. It serves the local area, including Clanton and surrounding regions[1][3].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  - The business operates from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Monday through Friday and is closed on Saturdays and Sundays. There is no specific information on payment methods, but it is common for plumbing services to accept various payment options including credit cards, checks, and cash[1][3].

- **Years in Operation**:
  - Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc. has been in business since January 1, 1979, making it over 46 years in operation[1].

## Services & Specialties

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  - The business provides all types of plumbing and gas services, including but not limited to faucet installation, leak repairs, kitchen sink repairs, and general plumbing maintenance. There is no service charge for visits[1][3].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  - The service area includes Clanton and the surrounding areas. The business is particularly known for servicing homes and investment properties within the local community[1][3].

- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  - While there is no explicit mention of 24/7 emergency services, the business is known for quick response times. For example, one review mentions that the owner, Ron, returned a call and arrived within an hour[3].

- **Any Listed Prices or Rates**:
  - There is no detailed pricing information available, but the business is noted for being reasonably priced. One review appreciates the honesty and fair pricing of the company[3].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  - Customers praise Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc. for its quick response times, fair pricing, and reliable service. For instance, one customer appreciated Ron's promptness in fixing a faucet and a leak under the kitchen sink, while another customer valued the peace of mind provided by Ron's extensive experience and community relationships[3].

- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  - Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc. is not BBB accredited but has an A+ BBB rating. The business has not undergone the BBB's vetting process to become accredited[1].

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  - Customers often highlight the business's reliability, quick response times, and fair pricing. There is also appreciation for Ron's extensive experience and his ability to provide peace of mind, especially during challenging times like the COVID-19 pandemic[3].

- **Response to Reviews**:
  - There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews, as the profile has not been claimed by the business owner or representative[3].

## Owner & Staff

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  - The owner of Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc. is Mr. Ron Rothenstine. He is also the principal contact and customer contact for the business[1].

- **Staff Qualifications**:
  - While specific staff qualifications are not detailed, Ron Rothenstine has over 40 years of experience in the plumbing trade. This extensive experience is often highlighted in customer reviews as a significant advantage[1][3].

- **Professional Certifications**:
  - The business is compliant with state licensing requirements, as indicated by its registration with the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board. However, specific certifications for individual staff members are not provided[1].
aboutUs: Ron's Old Time Plumbing, Inc. is a trusted local plumbing company serving Clanton and the surrounding areas. Our team of highly skilled and licensed professionals specializes in a wide range of plumbing services, from faucet installations and leak repairs to kitchen sink maintenance and general plumbing solutions. With our expertise and commitment to excellence, we ensure every job is done right the first time.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with our unparalleled expertise and reliable plumbing solutions.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times, ensuring your plumbing issues are addressed promptly and efficiently.
Fair and transparent pricing, providing exceptional value for your investment.
Comprehensive plumbing services tailored to meet the unique needs of your home or business.
